bug.author: znation
bug.summary: Reconcile Vega.js versions and upgrade to Vega 5
bug.description:
The current <denchmark-link:https://github.com/vega/vega/releases>latest release</denchmark-link> of Vega is 5.4.0. Currently in Turi Create, we are using the following versions:
3.2.1 in Turi Create Python (web based rendering). 4.4.0 in Vega Renderer (macOS native/C API rendering).
They give slightly different behavior, and 5.x has features we'd like to adopt. We should upgrade.
